title: game freezing bug
body: Whenever my USB headset gets unplugged or disconnected, league freezes and the only way to fix it is to force shutdown my computer, I have been getting lots of low priority because i can't fix the problem and log back in in time. I was wondering if you could fix this or give me advice on the matter

replies.body: in my case , i keep freezing also after the champion select that the other league of legends client opens, i summited a ticket and one tip told me to disable the windows 10 game bar to fix the problem , so far it worked for me, if you have windows 10 i suggest you try it out!
thank you for the advice, i'll try it out

Does this happen inside a game after you've loaded in or before you enter a game, such as in champ select? It's true that the Windows 10 Anniversary update did cause some issues for some players with crashing and PC freezes. Just as a quick step, you can [disable the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it causes any changes.
after i have loaded, and thanks, ill try it out
